name: The Resolution Machine
description:
The Resolution Machine is a simulator game where your New Year's Resolution is decided by a slot machine! 4 different new year's resolutions are available.

  • Music
  • Weightlifting
  • Studying
  • Art

(disclaimer: options may have small issues like music not being timed, we're aware!)

Development and coding - Jayden Y

Art, assets and music - Evan P 

Extra - Remy (small help with line work for splash art)

This game was made in 96 hours for the Dev Launchers Jam 2021 - Winters Edition with the theme "Resolution".

Programs used - Unity, FL Studio, Adobe Illustrator (Vector Art), Krita, Audacity, MS Paint.
